website_summaries.verdict: An no-heat wax that's not quite has harsh as some competing options. Includes everything you need in one affordable kit.
pros: Gel wax formula doesn't require heat, but works with body temperature instead
Suitable for most users with sensitive skin
In addition to wax,this kit includes an applicator, wipes, cotton strips, and moisturizing balm
cons: May not work well for coarse, thick hair
Although gentler than most, those with very sensitive skin may experience irritation

customer_reviews.title: Great for ending hair growth 🙆🙆
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Nads in my 30s. It removed my leg and arm hair. Now in my golden year's, I need Nads for the crazy hairs growing 🙈🙈😱😱 in my chin and the strays in my legs 🤦🤦🤦. The horror of crazy old hormones 😱😱😱 😱😱 😱. It really works. No more hairs on my chinny chin chin. 🙆🙆🙆🙆. PS. I used on my eyebrows to, so don't whine about the pain when it's an end to in need hair growth. 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nads doesn't leave my skin all red and rashy like hot wax
customer_reviews.text: While this is a no heat system, you have to heat it. It's just to thick to not have to melt it. It does work well. Not quite as well as real hot wax but the clean up is much easier. Water and soap cleans any spills or messes. Plus, Nads doesn't leave my skin all red and rashy like hot wax.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for me(read my thoughts to decide before buying)
customer_reviews.text: I have used for both my legs and hands. As my hair was little longer on legs this product was able to remove all hair and I was amazed. So tried on my arms where my hair little thinner and shorter. I got bruises and red rashes in the process. The wax stripes shrink after a wash and will not be in good shape for next use. If you are buying this product as it is economical, another check is on the length of the hair ( get them only if your hair is long and thick ). Consider ordering few more stripes to complete waxing legs and hand.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan Vadlamudi

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my hands and arms. i have a feeling it would work better on smaller areas. it hurts a bit less than regular wax, but that's not a problem for me. i like that there's no chance of burning myself. my hair is very thick and dark so it takes a couple attempts to get the hair off in some spots. the gel is very thick, so it's difficult to spread only a thin layer. i love that it's completely water soluble! the strips clean up very quickly. lastly, there's a lot of gel in the container; i could do my arms at least 3-4 times, if not more.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite waxing product! Really works, doesn’t hurt that much
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. They stopped carrying it at my local store, I am so glad that Amazon carries it. It really works, it hurts a lot less than traditional wax, and the cleanup is so much easier because you just wipe away the shoulder with warm water. It doesn’t hurt your skin or burn, you don’t have to heat it up. It works with your body temperature. In the winter time if it gets cold and the sugar is too thick, just microwave it for 15 to 30 seconds to get it room temperature and you are ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: I like using this on warm days the most
customer_reviews.text: This really works well when you follow the instructions. The warmer the wax, the easier it is to apply. I like using this on warm days the most. The strips in the kit are high quality. I've used them and rinsed the wax/hair off multiple times and I should be able to use them quite a bit more. I like that it comes with multiple application sticks. I was annoyed that when it was shipped the container of wax was on it's side. So the wax inside it was all on the side and I had to turn it right side up and wait a few hours for it to fall back into place.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my lower legs to test out before I did the bikini are. Thank god I didn’t do the bikini area because I’m RAW & inflamed. I needed way more strips but didn’t come enough strips in one box. Only enough for one lower leg (but I bought 2 boxes). It is not natural or gentle, I have sensitive skin and this was a fail. I wanted to do at home kits to save money, but it’s just not good enough!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: BEST "WAX" ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I used this for years and I cannot remember why I stopped. After finding this again and giving it another try I still have NO CLUE why I stopped using in the first place! What was I thinking!! This really is THE BEST hair removal "wax" of any kind that there is on the market! It always has been and it probably always will be. It was made of all natural ingredients before being all natural and organic was as in vogue as it is today!!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Gave me bruises
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews but felt impelled to due to the issues I had with this product. Was super disappointed due to reading such positive reviews. This product is very difficult to apply, does not remove all the hair, and gave me actual bruises. I could see this working okay for legs or like brows but I would advise against using this on bikini line at all costs. Was able to receive a refund easily though, so I definitely appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Mobilia

customer_reviews.title: This wax works, ladies!
customer_reviews.text: This wax is perfect for those of us who wax often. It’s a bit messy until you learn how to apply it correctly, but it washes off so easily. You can wash the application sticks and the strips. It’s well worth the money. Just don’t apply too much or it will not work as great. This product is really great. Takes off thin and coarse hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nads is the best
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else works as quickly, effectively, efficiently as nads. During these trying times, being in america and in south florida, going to get waxed is not a good option. I now have my brows under control again, underarms smooth, and legs as well. Still tons of it left. Love this stuff so much.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa East

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but I was surprised at how few hairs it actually removed. I thought perhaps the cloth strips were too long so I cut them in half to get a better rip effect but that didn't much matter. I used a little more gel, no difference. I used a very thin layer and still no great effect. If I am doing something wrong, I would be happy to hear it but I had much better results with the Nads Body Wax Strips. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Worked better than anticipated. Contrary to other users, I did find there were enough strips in the pack for one use. And, they are easily washable and reusable so the second use should be no issue either. The gel is viscous and takes some practice and patience to apply, but once applied it removed the hair without issue. I found the pain was even less than the wax at my salon. What a life-saver with my salon being closed due to the pandemic. I’ve already placed my second order!
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product but, for the most part, it did its job. I didnt get any cleansing wipes in my box and I dont think re-using the wax strip does anything but other than that I would recommend the product. I liked that the excess wax was easily removed by water so you never had that sticky residue
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this kit!! My leg hair was so long and it took care of it really easily. I waxed my whole leg using only 2 of the strips, you dont need a lot of wax, it doesnt leave my legs sticky, the moisturizer that comes with it feels so good! And it’s a lot cheaper to wax using this than to get it done somewhere else and pay tripple the amount you would for this whole kit. I have waxed my legs, armpits and stomach and the wax is still more than half
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey van Dijk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say as long as you follow the directions there should be no problems. The wax works with no problems 😳😂 . I’m happy with results!
customer_reviews.author: Queenshanique Weather

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I used this and heated it up 10, seconds, not 15. It was more than enough. I used the pre wax wash and then just put a medium light layer of the wax on my leg and the strips to follow. It worked excellently and it really was easy to wash off the cloth. However the cloth does kind of lose some strings so maybe just be more gentle but I'm happy I can reuse it. Definitely happy I got this!
customer_reviews.author: susu27

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this product, it's not messy and the washable cloth sheets are convenient. Mine was stiff when I got it since it was cold outside so I popped it in the microwave for like 10 seconds and it was super easy to apply afterwards. My legs feel super smooth and compared to other wax products I've tried this definitely wasn't as painful. This is definitely good for beginners too.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Google best practices for best results
customer_reviews.text: If you're new to waxing then you'll learn a lot with this product without any major problems. Treat small areas one at a time, yes you may need to heat it for anything other than facial use but that's normal. All natural formula doesn't irritate sensitive skin. As a cosmetologist of 7yrs I've always preferred Nads for personal at home use bc of its fast prep time and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me!!
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic of Coronavirus I decided to order this product based on all the good reviews. I followed instructions as directed, but it didn't work for me. Because all the salons are closed obviously, I have been shaving my underarms; and as a result, the hair grows back more coarser. I decided I'll wax my own underarms and I really looked forward to smooth, no ingrown hair underarms to my disappointment of a product that is not suitable for all hair types or skin as this product is claiming.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my skin a lot.
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked this a lot. I tried it in my arms and on my upper lip and it sas quite effective. HOWEVER as soon as I tried this on my legs it gave me a ton of irritation and didnt even remove the hair well. It's probably my fault though I've never waxed myself before.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years with great success. I've even recommended it to some of my friends. This is the third time I've ordered it through Amazon and noticed that this time the gel seems a lot thinner. I was hoping that would make it easier to use but unfortunately it's just less effective. Most of the gel was left on my skin and not a lot of hair was removed. I don't know if they changed their formula or if I just got a bad batch, but I would no longer recommend it and do not plan on buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Short learning curve, easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my thick underarm hair, and I LOVE it. It did take some trial and error to figure out what method worked for me - I usually have to do three applications per side to get all the different ways my hair grows. I love that it's water soluble and clean-up is easy. It doesn't get every hair, so I have to follow up with tweezers, but that's a small price to pay. The wax will also crystallize and not work anymore when it gets too old, but I do make it through most of a jar before that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Really good Wax
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and it doesn't leave any sticky residue after you finished it, you can even wash it off with simple water. Although I feel that the cloths work better for sensitive parts of your body or where there is small hairs, like your hands or face. The wax is actually really good and I'm glad it doesn't leave a foul smell when I add it to the microwave, like other wax products.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have never used wax before...I love how hice and smooth my legs are after I use this. It's not difficult and lasts for many applications.
customer_reviews.author: JodieF

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been waxing for awhile and just wanted to try something different. Big mistake. It didn't get much of the hair off at all, it just made a sticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Love it is a natural product! Don't have to worry about being burnt by wax
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to wax my teenage daughters legs. Minimal mess, able to reuse wax on strips multiple times, easy clean up. She said there was some discomfort on her skin after I pulled the strip, but burning sensation went away quickly. I used this product on my underarms as well, and it worked great! I am a new fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya Marquez

customer_reviews.title: I'm baaaaaack!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this in the stores much anymore so I tried the heat-it-up versions. Do not like them nearly as much and even scalded my underarms at one point. So glad to have this on my shelf again!!! Best product for underarms EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Better price than Ulta
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a year now and I love it I have low pain tolerance and it’s not too bad. It’s ripping hair out but it’s a good wax On here is cheaper than Ulta which is where i usually buy it from.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Could be better priced.
customer_reviews.text: Could be better priced. Works good as always and cleans up easy. Great for hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: THolliday

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. Doesn’t not work. I have been waxing for 15+ years and decided to try this gel instead -don’t waste your money. It makes you sticky and you (unwanted) hair will stay in place..
customer_reviews.author: Ioana N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Due to corona, I’ve been riding the struggle bus with hair regrowth. This stuff works, is easy and solves the problem! Buy it, you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Tetlow

customer_reviews.title: New formula doesnt work 😢
customer_reviews.text: This new formula doesn't work at all! This is not the wax it's gel. It doesn't get hard or dry . it's super sticky but doesn't remove hair. I used to swear by nads but no more. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MARLENE

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it very mucb
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work as good as i had hoped it doesn't grab the hair good enough
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Prather

customer_reviews.title: Not good 👎
customer_reviews.text: Dose not working good . I don’t like this and I don’t buy it again . very poor quality .👎
customer_reviews.author: Amrin akter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works like a professional wax hair remover. I like the cloth strips because it is washable.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.R.C.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than shaving
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Love that the strips are reusable. Smoother than shaving and last so much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina W. H.

customer_reviews.text: It removed some hair but it doesn’t remove all hair and a lot of wax is left behind and very hard to remove. I felt sticky even 3 days after using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: If you like coating yourself with sticky gunk and have it not remove any hair, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: KBCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The gel works very well for hair removal. Much easier than heating wax. This comes with lots of gel and supplies for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product natural and for easier spread a second or two in microwave. But it doesn’t hurt my sensitive skin after the wax is off and easily dissolves in the shower afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is by far the best spent product I have purchase in a while! It has every single thing you would need in a small box!
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Messy and doesn’t work. Hurts like it should but it actually made me bleed.
customer_reviews.author: John&Bre

customer_reviews.title: ... it out to any part of my skin really disappointed was looking forward to not shaving
customer_reviews.text: When received the gel was hard as a rock and impossible to spread it out to any part of my skin really disappointed was looking forward to not shaving...
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure if I'm doing this right but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I'm doing this right but when I lay on the wax over the skin and put the strip over it, the wax still remains kind of gooey and does not come off clean when pulling the strip off. Did not work for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Skin gone and hair here to stay!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always heard horror stories of people waxing their own skin off and wondered how horrible it would feel. Well wonder no more!!!! It feels awful. This product, in addition to being extremely messy, will succeed at removing plenty of living skin whilst leaving most of your hair intact. A true feat of cosmetic science.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Leigh-Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: love it/ no hair for over one month
customer_reviews.text: I love that my legs last 4 to six weeks without any hair. I love it. Easy to use. I Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work like it says it does. I followed the directions and nothing came off as far as hair. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thick. Warmed it up for easier application. NOT painless. Videos make it seem easier than it really is. Kinda messy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Ant attractor
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me and after i had disposed it in the trashcan it attracted ants all the way up to my 3rd story master bath. I have never had that happen with anything else and I will not be trying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE BEST PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE USED MULTIPLE WA PRODUCTS IN THE PAST AND THIS ONE IS NOT HE BEST. I EVEN WARMED IT UP TO SEE IF THAT WOULD HELP. IT DOES REMOVE ALL HAIRS FROM EYEBROWS, I MEAN NOT EVEN 1/2 OF THEM. I ONLY PURCHASED IT BECAUSE THE BRAND I USE WAS OUT OF STOCK.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it washes off easily if I make a mess. Really good at getting all the hair off. The only thing is that you do need to warm it a little to get it to spread correctly,
customer_reviews.author: Kim Conway

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient at this product.
customer_reviews.text: I may not be very good at using this product, but didn’t really work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It removes all of the hair. My only complaint is that I wish it came with more strips. They're easy to rinse clean, but it's not enough to wax my legs in one sitting. I'd still purchase it again though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: This will be my go to wax from home. Actually I won’t even have to wax face anymore which is where I have more hair. I usually wax side burns, chin and lip.. but this will do intead and I’ll save 40$. A bit messy being my first time but second time around the mess was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn't work for me. I followed the instructions, but it would only pull out a few hairs and just made my legs all sticky. Although it didn't work, it didn't irritate my skin, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No no ni
customer_reviews.text: Super messy, doesnt remove hair its too liquidy. Gel that hardens is way better i am super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Linna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. I recommend warning the wax a bit to make spreading easier. Just like a wax at a shop.
customer_reviews.author: Kmolina

customer_reviews.title: Great, all natural product
customer_reviews.text: Great, all natural product. It didn't irritate my skin as much as regular wax does because it didn't take the top layer of skin. Also didn't have as much redness. On the down side, it just didn't get ALL of the hair in the first pass. I might order it again just to give it a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It smells not good. And it doesn’t work for me very well.
customer_reviews.author: jeness

customer_reviews.title: Cant be stored
customer_reviews.text: This product was great the first time I used it. Every hair came off with little mess. Theres a lot of wax in the jar so I put it away for later use. Now it's goopy and doesnt work. The gel isnt even sticking to the cotton strips. I'm so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is ok but it does hurt! Lol that’s the only thing that’s stopped me from keeping using it is the pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Destin Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use especially when parlour visits are tough. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Madhulina Choudhury

customer_reviews.title: Used once. Never again. Hurts ans pulls!
customer_reviews.text: Painful! Heated or not, it hurts! It pulls if the hair isn't basically shaved down to less than a quarter inch before putting this sticky junk on.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: these were very painful but I don't usually wax
customer_reviews.text: For me, these were very painful but I don't usually wax. I did appreciate how well the strips rinse out, that was very neat.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.
customer_reviews.text: I forgot how much I loved this wax. I have been using the nads pre-waxed strips to wax my legs because all the targets by me don't carry the jar anymore. This is PRACTICALLY painless in comparison to any other type of wax I have ever used. I will never go back to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Love Starbucks

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and for a sticky wax easy to clean, but not as easy and convenient as hard wax. I do have sensitive skin and some sensitive areas it was a no go, but legs it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, wax dries out in a short time and then it becomes useless. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: blah

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to use but worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to use if you don’t follow the instructions carefully but removed most of the hairs through multiple tries. Takes a while for hair to grow back unlike razor-shaven hairs and the hairs are softer. Will try again and hope I get better at it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: n/a
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before. It works well for me. My last purchase lasted for two years.
customer_reviews.author: -Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Overall not a bad wax. Clean up is easy enough
customer_reviews.text: Will not get ALL the hair. Overall not a bad wax. Clean up is easy enough. It does get messy. I probably won't purchase again. Still hunting a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Thok

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective product
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked for me in the past but i ran out and bought some more. This time the gel is ineffective! Its too runny, there was no thickness to it at all and didnt work at ALL. So disappointed. Im not buying from here again.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Used already
customer_reviews.text: I just received package and noticed wax on outside of wax jar. I opened it and there’s wax missing. Definitely doesn’t Seem like I’m the first person to open this
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about using this product but it worked surprisingly well. As long as you are ok with waxing yourself, it is pretty easy. Only downside is that it is definitely sticky, so usually if I wax I do it right before I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of time and money. I’ve tried it on several areas, and would only remove a few hairs at a time. I would give it a zero if possible. Makes more of a mess than what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it. So much easier than heating wax and ...
customer_reviews.text: i've used this for years and years. LOVE it. So much easier than heating wax and so easy to clean up... just warm water. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: JAI

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. It’s just a sticky mess. I allowed growth to be the length recommended and it did not pull any hair out. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mary Ochoa Cacari

customer_reviews.title: So the instructions say apply a thin layer. Right ...
customer_reviews.text: So the instructions say apply a thin layer. Right, this stuff is very thick and that's impossible. It works but really hard to apply the right amount and it's messy. If stick with the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Magjm02

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: really good product. Used this on my legs. Worked perfectly, and the cotton strips really are reusable. I am very pleased after using the new Sally Hansen product which was a huge mess and didn’t even remove the hair from my legs.
customer_reviews.author: margaret fitch

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend to friends or family
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this item it does everything listed instead the most important remove the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Essence Levine

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The instructions stated that the product works best at room temperature. I tried this, no hair was removed (several attempts). I heated the gel, still no hair removed. This was a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to clean, great value
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to use and it works very well. It could be cleaned just by water. Also, I like the reusable cotton stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I like that it dissolves with water and the strips are reusable but it doesn’t really take out that much hair. I have to go over the same spot four or five times and I still have some hairs left.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand it! The gel is so tiny! I am buying the full jar next time
customer_reviews.author: nunu_t99

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as one would think
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to use as I thought it would be. I've tried 3 different days and failed all 3 times to remove anything.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love it, wish after wax lotion came in bigger size though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: worked great. still hurts to rip out your hair, but its not hot wax burning you. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: holly p

customer_reviews.title: It barely works. I used it a couple times ...
customer_reviews.text: It barely works. I used it a couple times and made sure to read the directions both times and I still ended up going to get it professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this don’t work what waste of money ;(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Disliked it didnt work as it should. Didnt pick up any hairs.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me at all. I've waxed myself, and been waxed professionally. This stuff sucks. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I followed directions and the gel would not adhere to the strip. It was incredibly frustrating since I remember using it years ago and it working great! Maybe it changed?
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It smell really good
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent. So far i have use it just for my lips and eyebrows. The only part missing is the cotton strips. I didn’t get those.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morel

customer_reviews.title: Very messy
customer_reviews.text: Very messy, does not work well with thick type hair.
customer_reviews.author: Villagepanda

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine, blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, blonde hair. This didn't take any hair off. None. I read the instructions many times to make sure I was doing it right. I was. No hair off. Multiple attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for at home waxing
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for at home waxing. I love how the sugar wax rinses off with water. No need for fancy wax-removing oils when using this. I also love how the strips are re-usable. Just rinse off and air dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Nad's
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and I used it immediately. It was wonderful. I did find that heating in the microwave for 20-30 seconds helped with the consistency so it applied easier. No too long or it can become too hot for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: shopper24

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This pen allows me to wax my eyebrows with precision. It is great considering that everything is closed right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: gold standard for years!
customer_reviews.text: this wax has been my gold standard for years and years! works great. Love that any residue washes off with water. highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jese

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: Why is the gel so hard? I can’t use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nad's Wax Kit Gel - Wax Hair Removal For Women - Body+Face Wax - All Skin Types - At Home Waxing Kit With 6 Oz Wax Gel, Cleansing Wipes, Wooden Spatula, Re-Usable Cotton Strips, Moisture Soothing Balm
product_meta.description: Size:6 OunceNad's has put everything you need for the best hair removal results at home in a convenient wax kit! Along with Nad's Original Hair Removal Gel, the kit includes washable/reusable cotton strips, cleansing wipes, PLUS Nad’s Moisture+ Soothing Body Balm for after hair removal skincare. Nad's Natural Hair Removal Gel is the original no-heat formula that warms with body heat as it’s smoothed onto the skin and waxed away – along with your unwanted hair – to leave the skin salon smooth for up to four weeks. Best of all, if you make a mistake with application, the formula simply rinses off with water.
feature_bullets: The Original No Heat Gel Wax Formula
Gentle & Suitable hair removal for all skin types, Ideal for all Body areas including face, Results up to 4 weeks, Easily washes away with water
No heat formula warms with your body temperature so there's no chance of burning your skin
Contains natural ingredients suitable for sensitive skin
